name: Krushi Mitra Chat Bot
desc: Krushi Mitra, your AI-powered farm assistant, keeps Maharashtra's farmers informed with the latest farming news, location-specific crop recommendations and agricultural innovations.

name: Weather App
desc: Weather app is a front-end website that provides weather information for various cities in degrees Celsius. It uses a weather API to fetch data

name: Moneyplant App
desc: Money Plant is an Angular mini-project developed during training. It functions as a search engine for experts, allowing users to find specialists based on location and specific skills.

name: Meetings App
desc: This is a meetings application where a user can create meetings and teams for their work purpose.They can also keep track of the meetings and teams they are included in it

name: Helpdesk App
desc: Helpdesk App is an application that streamlines the issue resolution with ticketing, role-based access, and an FAQ system.
